member.name: P:Abp.Web.SignalR.AbpSignalRContractResolver.IgnoredAssemblies
member.summary: List of ignored assemblies. It contains only the SignalR's own assembly. If you don't want that your assembly's types are automatically camel cased while sending to the client, then add it to this list.
